amendment.description: Amendment makes in order for consideration a new manager's amendment to be offered in lieu of the manager's amendment contained in H. Rept. 107-264.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make in order a new manager's amendment to be offered in lieu of the manager's amendment currently contained in the rule.

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 207 (Roll no. 419).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reynolds amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 379 - 50 (Roll no. 420).
